attributes.action: To give signal dad's the same rights to housing as single mums.
attributes.additional_details: Why do dads who split from a child's mother need court ordered paperwork to prove their sheared custody over children. Even if the relationship breakdown is amicable and no need for court or solicitors being involved is a shambles, dads get no help from councils or the government and this needs to change as its discrimination on good hard working dads who only want to prove and be involved with their children.
attributes.background: To allow dad's the same rights to housing as mum's without the need to split children apart or the need to sign over benefits. Single dads have no rights to housing to allow children to have their own bedrooms despite dads having access to their children in amicable breakups without court orders.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Social housing priority lists are a matter for local authorities. You can find out more here

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/joint-service-housing-advice-office-leaflet-index/social-housing-updated-23-april-2020
